name: Newton's Squirrel
description:
The game was created in 2 days for Backtrace Gamejam 3!

"Newton's Squirrel" is an endless runner in which you have to help the squirrel to climb as high as possible! You have to use gravity to avoid all obstacles. Types of obstacles: branch (static object), apple (falls down).

Controls:

Space — Reverse gravity

A — Go to the left side of the tree

D — Go to the right side of the tree
